actions.committee: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit performance awards in the Senior Executive Service during sequestration periods.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Prohibits a federal agency from paying a performance award to an employee in a Senior Executive Service position during a sequestration period or any period during which a sequestration order is issued under the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit performance awards in the Senior Executive Service during sequestration periods.
